posts.post_title: T206 Player Jap Barbeau signed baseball
posts.post_content: I realize that this is in the wrong section. But I feel it would get more views here where it’s appreciated haha. Leon if it must be moved I’m completely fine with that. Comes with a major COA. $400 shipped.
